title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 813.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 813.2 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) Certified
programs operated by a municipality or a voluntary agency, as defined in this

Part, or a proposed incorporator of a voluntary agency may apply to the Office
for financial assistance for capital projects in the form of a state aid grant, the amount of which shall be available from amounts appropriated to the Office
and approved by the Division of Budget ("DOB"). (b) Voluntary agencies, cities, and counties
(towns are excluded) may also apply for financial assistance from the Dormitory

Authority of the State of New York (DASNY), successor to the Facilities

Development Corporation (FDC), through the Office as its agent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
813.2

Adopted

New

York State Register May 17, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 20, eff. 5/17/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
